  <GoabText size="heading-l" tag="h1">Heading for the page</GoabText>

</>

troubleshooting.cause: CSS conflicts or missing design tokens
troubleshooting.solution: Check that design system CSS is loaded and no conflicting styles override component styles

troubleshooting.issue: Heading levels not creating proper document structure
troubleshooting.cause: Using visual size instead of semantic heading tags
troubleshooting.solution: Use proper h1-h6 tags for headings. Override size if needed: `<GoabText tag="h2" size="heading-s">`

troubleshooting.issue: Text too wide and hard to read
troubleshooting.cause: No width constraints on long-form content
troubleshooting.solution: Use maxWidth prop for optimal reading: `<GoabText maxWidth="600px">` or use CSS container queries

troubleshooting.cause: Invalid color value or CSS specificity issues
troubleshooting.solution: Use valid color values (primary, secondary, success, etc.) and check for CSS conflicts

troubleshooting.issue: Screen readers not announcing content properly
troubleshooting.solution: Use semantic HTML tags (h1-h6 for headings, p for paragraphs) and ensure logical heading progression

troubleshooting.cause: Mixed content or inconsistent font families
troubleshooting.solution: Ensure all related text uses variant="mono" and consider table layout for aligned data

troubleshooting.issue: Text appearing too small on mobile
troubleshooting.cause: Fixed sizing not responsive to screen size
troubleshooting.solution: Test text sizes on mobile devices and consider using larger base sizes for mobile-first designs

troubleshooting.solution: Use mt/mb props with design system tokens (none, xs, s, m, l, xl, 2xl, 3xl, 4xl) for consistent spacing
